about_the_game:
What is it about?

The love of your life is waiting for you,

Do you dare to live a unique story? Here you will find couples of all kinds: men, women and beyond your imagination.

Dare to fall in love, create your path and discover how each step can change your destiny. Your story begins now!

A game that transforms with you.

In this visual novel, every choice you make will be a reflection of you. The story not only moves forward, but changes its tone, its essence and even its destiny according to the decisions you make.

Do you prefer a touch of mystery and darkness, or are you looking for laughter and unforgettable moments? This game is tailored to you, offering you a completely personalized experience.

From the very first moment, you are in charge of the adventure, are you ready to discover how far your choices will take you?

This game is in Early Access,

offering you the first of many stories we have planned. In the future, more than 15 original stories await you, each with its own style and special touches that will make you want to explore them all.

Your opinion is key for us. If you decide to join this adventure, don't forget to leave a review about your experience. We will read every comment and work constantly to improve and offer you an unforgettable experience.

Thank you for being part of this initial stage, your journey is just beginning, and we want you to grow with us!

highlighted.name: You fell in love with a cat

content_descriptors.notes: Beware this game contains psychological horror, adult themes, depression, inappropriate language and a couple of nudity.

detailed_description:
What is it about?

The love of your life is waiting for you,

Do you dare to live a unique story? Here you will find couples of all kinds: men, women and beyond your imagination.

Dare to fall in love, create your path and discover how each step can change your destiny. Your story begins now!

A game that transforms with you.

In this visual novel, every choice you make will be a reflection of you. The story not only moves forward, but changes its tone, its essence and even its destiny according to the decisions you make.

Do you prefer a touch of mystery and darkness, or are you looking for laughter and unforgettable moments? This game is tailored to you, offering you a completely personalized experience.

From the very first moment, you are in charge of the adventure, are you ready to discover how far your choices will take you?

This game is in Early Access,

offering you the first of many stories we have planned. In the future, more than 15 original stories await you, each with its own style and special touches that will make you want to explore them all.

Your opinion is key for us. If you decide to join this adventure, don't forget to leave a review about your experience. We will read every comment and work constantly to improve and offer you an unforgettable experience.

name: Virtual Love Secrets

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: 💖 The dating game that fits you!💖Your decisions shape the story and reveal who you are. Win over charismatic Vtubers, experience unique romances and discover your ideal virtual partner - love awaits you! ❤️
supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Latin America*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
